app_store_metadata.subtitle: AI-Curated Daily News Digest
app_store_metadata.keywords: ai news,daily digest,news summary,artificial intelligence,tech news,ai headlines,news aggregator,smart news,personalized news,ai updates,machine learning news,news briefing,ai curated,news reader,trending ai
app_store_metadata.description:
Stay ahead of the AI revolution with AI News Today — your intelligent daily news companion.

AI News Today uses advanced artificial intelligence to curate, summarize, and deliver the most important news stories directly to you. No more doomscrolling through endless feeds. Get the stories that matter, distilled into clear, concise summaries.

▸ AI-POWERED CURATION
Our AI engine scans thousands of sources to surface the stories that matter most. Every article is summarized so you can stay informed in minutes, not hours.

▸ DAILY DIGEST NOTIFICATIONS
Start your morning with a personalized news briefing delivered right to your lock screen. Never miss a breaking story.

▸ PERSONALIZED FEED
The more you read, the smarter your feed gets. AI News Today learns your interests and tailors content to match what you care about.

▸ BOOKMARK & SAVE
Save articles for later with one tap. Build your own library of must-read stories and revisit them anytime.

▸ CLEAN, DISTRACTION-FREE READING
No clutter, no autoplay videos, no clickbait. Just the news, beautifully presented.

FREE TO START
Read up to 5 articles per day for free. Upgrade to AI News Today Pro for unlimited access to every story, every day.

Whether you're tracking the latest in artificial intelligence, machine learning breakthroughs, or tech industry moves — AI News Today keeps you informed without the noise.

Download now and let AI do the reading for you.
app_store_metadata.promotional_text: Your daily AI news briefing — curated, summarized, and delivered by artificial intelligence.

age_rating.reason: Infrequent/Mild Mature/Suggestive Themes — news content may cover sensitive real-world topics
